scripts.test:prepare: yarn build:icon && yarn copy:assets:tauri && yarn build --no-bundle
scripts.dev:tauri: yarn build:icon && yarn copy:assets:tauri && cross-env IS_CLEAN=true tauri dev
scripts.dev:ios: yarn copy:assets:mobile && RUSTC_WRAPPER= cross-env IS_IOS=true yarn tauri ios dev --features mobile
scripts.dev:android: yarn copy:assets:mobile && cross-env IS_ANDROID=true yarn tauri android dev --features mobile
scripts.build:android: yarn build:icon && yarn copy:assets:mobile && cross-env IS_CLEAN=true yarn tauri android build -- --no-default-features --features mobile
scripts.build:ios: yarn build:icon && yarn copy:assets:mobile && cross-env IS_IOS=true yarn tauri ios build -- --no-default-features --features mobile
scripts.build:ios:device: yarn build:icon && yarn copy:assets:mobile && cross-env IS_IOS=true yarn tauri ios build -- --no-default-features --features mobile --export-method debugging
scripts.build:tauri:linux: yarn download:bin && NO_STRIP=1 ./src-tauri/build-utils/shim-linuxdeploy.sh yarn tauri build && ./src-tauri/build-utils/buildAppImage.sh
scripts.build:tauri:darwin: yarn download:bin && yarn build:mlx-server && yarn tauri build --target universal-apple-darwin
scripts.build:tauri:plugin:api: cd src-tauri/plugins && yarn install && yarn workspaces foreach -Apt run build
scripts.build:core: cd core && yarn build && yarn pack
scripts.build:extensions: rimraf ./pre-install/*.tgz || true && yarn workspace @janhq/core build && cd extensions && yarn install && cd .. && run-script-os
scripts.build:extensions:darwin: cd extensions && yarn workspaces foreach -Apt run build:publish
scripts.build:extensions:win32: cd extensions && yarn workspaces foreach -Apt --exclude @janhq/mlx-extension run build:publish
scripts.build:extensions:linux: cd extensions && yarn workspaces foreach -Apt --exclude @janhq/mlx-extension run build:publish
